title: mahAgaNapatE pAlayashumAm
sahitya:
mahAgaNapatE pAlayAshumAm mAyAmaya vallabhApatE shrI


caraNam   mahA naTa nArAyaNI nandana mAnita dEva dEvakI nandana 
mahEshvara guruguha bhakta candana mAtanga vadanEndrAdi vandana
				(ciTTasvara)
